subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: The Nets continued their off-season run of signings, agreeing to a two-year deal with forward Kris Humphries, who averaged 13.8 points and 11 rebounds for the team last season.
snippet: The Nets continued their off-season run of signings, agreeing to a two-year deal with forward Kris Humphries, who averaged 13.8 points and 11 rebounds for the team last season.
